credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: Four Figures and Animals in a Landscape, Charles Prendergast
inscriptions: Verso: in Charles Prendergast's hand - "This is the panel I had in the exhibition - C.P." "I always bless you for the warm Jager blanket you gave me - [?] Christmas C.P."
